From Down Main and Down Relief

Of the three lines available at Pengam, one should always be free to facilitate run-rounds or access to/from TidalSidings.Note that the maximum standage in the sidings here is 64 SLUs (total length) each.  FOCs need to make allowancefor loco length when run rounds are required.
